title: Cinderella (2015 Disney film)
summary: Cinderella is a 2015 romantic fantasy film directed by Kenneth Branagh, with a screenplay written by Chris Weitz, and co-produced by Walt Disney Pictures, Kinberg Genre, Allison Shearmur Productions, and Beagle Pug Films. The film is based on the folk tale and is a live action adaptation of Walt Disney's 1950 animated film of the same name.[1] It features Lily James as the title character, alongside Cate Blanchett, Richard Madden, Stellan Skarsg√•rd, Holliday Grainger, Derek Jacobi, and Helena Bonham Carter.
